trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered set of <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref> elements that identify an item of content.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un set ordinato di <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"> </xref> elementi che identificano un elemento di contenuto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> elements defined within a ContentLocatorGroup provides a structured means to refer to an external data item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>gli elementi definiti all'interno di un ContentLocatorGroup forniscono una struttura per fare riferimento a un elemento di dati esterno.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable deep copy clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea un clone modificabile della copia completa di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This Clone method creates modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: Clone (metodo) Crea modificabile copie di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetti.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, Clone shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, Clone nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more details, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be `false` even if this source <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is `true.` When copying dependency properties, Clone copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy not animations or current animation values.
trans-unit.target: Clonato <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>del <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A>proprietà sarà `false` origine anche se questo <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>del <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A>proprietà `true.` durante la copia delle proprietà di dipendenza, Clone copia delle associazioni dati e dei riferimenti di risorsa (anche se non possono risolvere) ma non la copia non le animazioni né i relativi valori correnti.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un clone modificabile della copia completa di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: See [Annotations Schema](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for schema details.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [nello Schema con annotazioni](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) per i dettagli dello schema.

trans-unit.source: GetSchema is provided to fulfill the contract of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: GetSchema viene fornito per rispettare il contratto del <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable>interfaccia.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: See [Annotations Schema](../Topic/Annotations%20Schema.md) for schema details.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [nello Schema con annotazioni](../Topic/Annotations%20Schema.md) per i dettagli dello schema.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref> elements that make up this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta del <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"> </xref> gli elementi che compongono questo <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> collection returned will never be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>insieme restituito non sarà mai `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup> contains no <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> objects, the returned collection will contain zero elements.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>non contiene alcun <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>oggetti, la raccolta restituita conterrà zero elementi.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref> elements that make up this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta di <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"> </xref> gli elementi che compongono questo <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Deserializes the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref> from a specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: Deserializza il <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"> </xref> da specificato <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The XML reader to use to deserialize the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il lettore XML da usare per deserializzare il <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: The serialized XML for the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Il codice XML serializzato per il <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"> </xref> non è valido.

trans-unit.source: Serializes the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref> to a specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Serializza il <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"> </xref> a specificato <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.target: Il writer XML da usare per serializzare il <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"> </xref>.
